sentences.en: A series of technical foul-ups delayed the launch of the new product.
sentences.cn: 一系列技术问题延误了新产品的上市。

sentences.en: After some technical hitches the show finally got under way.
sentences.cn: 一些小技术故障解决后，演出终于开始了。

sentences.en: Don't you think we should ask this young man some technical questions?
sentences.cn: 你不觉得我们应该向这位年轻人请教几个技术问题吗？

sentences.en: He had trouble keeping up his end of a technical discussion.
sentences.cn: 他没能在一场技术探讨中坚持自己的立场。

sentences.en: He really enjoys putting across a technical argument.
sentences.cn: 他很喜欢向别人解释技术上的问题。

sentences.en: He's just written a book, nicely illustrated and not too technical.
sentences.cn: 他刚写完一本书，插图精美，内容也并不艰涩。

sentences.en: I have no technical knowledge at all.
sentences.cn: 我一点技术知识都没有。

sentences.en: Many technical experts at the time had doubts about the technology.
sentences.cn: 当时，许多技术专家对那种工艺抱有疑问。

sentences.en: Our staff will be available to give you technical support .
sentences.cn: 有我们的员工向你提供技术支持。

sentences.en: Relentless in his pursuit of quality, his technical ability was remarkable.
sentences.cn: 对质量孜孜不倦的追求使他的技能出类拔萃。

sentences.en: The engineer and his son held frequent consultations concerning technical problems.
sentences.cn: 工程师和他的儿子经常就技术问题互相征求意见。

sentences.en: The pilot told the control tower that he'd run into technical trouble.
sentences.cn: 飞行员报告机场控制塔他遇到了技术问题。

sentences.en: The technical aspects were the concern of the Army.
The technical superiority of laser discs over tape is well established.
sentences.cn: 激光影碟相对于磁带的技术优势早已牢牢确立。

sentences.en: The technical term for sunburn is erythema.
sentences.cn: 晒斑的专业术语是红斑。

sentences.en: They lacked the scientific personnel to develop the technical apparatus much further.
sentences.cn: 他们缺少能够进一步研发这一技术装置的科研人员。

words.tran_cn: 技术上；专门地；学术上；工艺上
高科技专家；热衷电子学的电子迷；技师
学术性；专门性；术语，专门语
技师，技术员；技巧纯熟的人
专家管理；专家政治论，技术统治论
技术统治论者；专家政治论者；技术统治
熟练的,精通的,有能力的

phrases.tran_cn: 技术情报，技术信息；技术资料
技术要求；技术条件；技巧请求

trans.tran_cn: 技术的，技能的，技艺的，技巧的，专业的
trans.tran_en: connected with knowledge of how machines work
